entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
